revised_title: Harmonic Analyzer: A New Instrument for Analyzing Tides and Meteorological Data
tldr: The author presents a harmonic analyzer, an instrument designed to analyze the product of two given functions. The machine can be used for tidal analysis and meteorological work, and is handed over to the Meteorological Office for practical use. The author also plans to construct a new machine with more disk and cylinder integrators for further tidal analysis.
